languages.text: "Превратить погребальный обряд в акт стяжательства — богохульство. Оспаривать волю покойного — богохульство вдвойне". {n}Черные глаза культистки прожигают мужчину, и тот, нервно сглотнув, отводит взгляд.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Превратить погребальный обряд в акт стяжательства — богохульство. Оспаривать волю покойного — богохульство вдвойне". {n}Черные глаза культистки прожигают мужчину, и тот, нервно сглотнув, отводит взгляд.{/n}

languages.text: "To turn a funeral rite into a stepping stone for one's covetous desires is blasphemy. To dispute the will of the dead is doubly blasphemous." {n}Kibellah's dark eyes seem to burn right through the man, making him swallow nervously and avert his gaze.{/n}

"To turn a funeral rite into a stepping stone for one's covetous desires is blasphemy. To dispute the will of the dead is doubly blasphemous." {n}Kibellah's dark eyes seem to burn right through the man, making him swallow nervously and avert his gaze.{/n}

languages.text: «Convertir un rito funerario en un trampolín para los deseos personales es una blasfemia, y el doble de eso si hablamos de cuestionar la voluntad de los muertos». {n}Los ojos oscuros de Kibellah parecen estar quemando al hombre, haciéndole tragar saliva con nerviosismo y apartar la mirada.{/n}
languages.original_text: "To turn a funeral rite into a stepping stone for one's covetous desires is blasphemy. To dispute the will of the dead is doubly blasphemous." {n}Kibellah's dark eyes seem to burn right through the man, making him swallow nervously and avert his gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Convertir un rito funerario en un trampolín para los deseos personales es una blasfemia, y el doble de eso si hablamos de cuestionar la voluntad de los muertos.». {n}Los ojos oscuros de Kibellah parecen estar quemando al hombre, haciéndole tragar saliva con nerviosismo y apartar la mirada.{/n}

languages.text: 「葬儀の儀式を貪欲な欲望の踏み台にすることは冒涜である。死者の意志に異議を唱えることは、二重に冒涜である」{n}キベラの黒い瞳が男を射抜くように燃え上がる。男は緊張したように唾を飲み込み、視線をそらした。{/n}
languages.original_text: "To turn a funeral rite into a stepping stone for one's covetous desires is blasphemy. To dispute the will of the dead is doubly blasphemous." {n}Kibellah's dark eyes seem to burn right through the man, making him swallow nervously and avert his gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「葬儀の儀式を貪欲な欲望の踏み台にすることは冒涜である。死者の意志に異議を唱えることは、二重に冒涜である」{n}キベラの黒い瞳が男を射抜くように燃え上がる。男は緊張したように唾を飲み込み、視線をそらした。{/n}

languages.text: “把葬礼变成充斥着贪婪与欲望的闹剧，这是亵渎之举。对死者的遗嘱提出异议，这更是双倍的亵渎。”{n}绮贝菈的黑眼睛死死地盯着那个人，视线仿佛要将他刺穿。他紧张地咽了口口水，移开了视线。{/n}
languages.original_text: "To turn a funeral rite into a stepping stone for one's covetous desires is blasphemy. To dispute the will of the dead is doubly blasphemous." {n}Kibellah's dark eyes seem to burn right through the man, making him swallow nervously and avert his gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “把葬礼变成充斥着贪婪与欲望的闹剧，这是亵渎之举。对死者的遗嘱提出异议，这更是双倍的亵渎。”{n}绮贝菈的黑眼睛死死地盯着那个人，视线仿佛要将他刺穿。他紧张地咽了口口水，移开了视线。{/n}

languages.text: "Einen Bestattungsritus zu einem Trittstein für Begehrlichkeiten zu machen, ist Blasphemie. Den Willen der Toten anzufechten, ist doppelt blasphemisch." {n}Kibellahs dunkle Augen scheinen den Mann zu durchbohren, der nervös schluckt und ihrem Blick ausweicht.{/n}
languages.original_text: "To turn a funeral rite into a stepping stone for one's covetous desires is blasphemy. To dispute the will of the dead is doubly blasphemous." {n}Kibellah's dark eyes seem to burn right through the man, making him swallow nervously and avert his gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Einen Bestattungsritus zu einem Trittstein für Begehrlichkeiten zu machen, ist Blasphemie. Den Willen der Toten anzufechten, ist doppelt blasphemisch." {n}Kibellahs dunkle Augen scheinen den Mann zu durchbohren, der nervös schluckt und ihrem Blick ausweicht.{/n}

languages.text: « Pervertir un rite funéraire pour assouvir un désir cupide relève du blasphème. Bafouer la volonté des morts est un sacrilège encore plus effroyable. » {n}Les yeux sombres de Kibellah semblent fouailler l'âme de l'homme, et il déglutit nerveusement tout en détournant le regard.{/n}
languages.original_text: "To turn a funeral rite into a stepping stone for one's covetous desires is blasphemy. To dispute the will of the dead is doubly blasphemous." {n}Kibellah's dark eyes seem to burn right through the man, making him swallow nervously and avert his gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Pervertir un rite funéraire pour assouvir un désir cupide relève du blasphème. Bafouer la volonté des morts est un sacrilège encore plus effroyable. » {n}Les yeux sombres de Kibellah semblent fouailler l'âme de l'homme, et il déglutit nerveusement tout en détournant le regard.{/n}

languages.text: "Bir cenaze törenini kişinin tamahkâr gayeleri için bir araca dönüştürmek dine aykırılıktır. Ölünün arzusuna karşı çıkmak ise dine iki kat aykırılıktır." {n}Kibellah'nın adamı yakıp kül edercesine bakan kapkara gözleri, adamın gergince yutkunarak bakışlarını kaçırmasına neden oluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "To turn a funeral rite into a stepping stone for one's covetous desires is blasphemy. To dispute the will of the dead is doubly blasphemous." {n}Kibellah's dark eyes seem to burn right through the man, making him swallow nervously and avert his gaze.{/n}
